assessment_item.data:
{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

நிறமித் தொகுப்பு தன்னிச்சையாக  செயல்படுவது

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

சுழற்சியற்ற ஒளி பாஸ்பரிகரணத்தில்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:8460"},{"text":"

சுழற்சி ஒளி பாஸ்பரிகரணத்தில்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:8461"},{"text":"

ஆக்சிஜனேற்ற பாஸ்பரிகரணத்தில்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:8471"},{"text":"

ஒளி பிளத்தலின் போது

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:8476"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

C_4 தாவரங்கள் C_3 தாவரங்களிலிருந்து வேறுபடுவது

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

முதலில் உண்டாகும் உற்பத்தி பொருள்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:8460"},{"text":"

கார்பன் டை ஆக்சைடை ஏற்கும் தளப்பொருள்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:8461"},{"text":"

எடுத்துக்கொள்ளும் ATP மூலக்கூறுகளின் எண்ணிக்கை

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:8471"},{"text":"

இவை அனைத்தும்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:8476"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"C_4 தாவரங்கள் C_3 தாவரங்களிலிருந்து வேறுபடுவது ","title":"C_4 தாவரங்கள் C_3 தாவரங்களிலிருந்து வேறுபடுவது ","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Botany","qlevel":"DIFFICULT","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]},"medium":"Tamil","questionTitle":"C_4 தாவரங்கள் C_3 தாவரங்களிலிருந்து வேறுபடுவது ","qlevel":"DIFFICULT","subject":"Botany","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","templateType":"Horizontal","isPartialScore":true,"gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"isShuffleOption":true,"max_score":1,"name":"C_4 தாவரங்கள் C_3 தாவரங்களிலிருந்து வேறுபடுவது ","title":"C_4 தாவரங்கள் C_3 தாவரங்களிலிருந்து வேறுபடுவது ","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}
